short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modeling+ Pro is a tool for utilizing Modeling+ functionalities with key board shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Modeling+ Pro lets you leverage Modeling+ (https://workspace.google.com/marketplace/app/modeling+/531695166324) functionalities with keyboard shortcuts.

** Key functionality (As of version 0.4.2; for Mac, replace Ctrl with MacCtrl) **
Ctrl + Shift + ]: Jump to the first reference found in the cell formula
Ctrl + Shift + [: Jump back to the previous cell
Ctrl + Shift + C: Toggle font colors (Black >> Blue >> Green)
Ctrl + Shift + S: Default font color
Ctrl + Shift + V: Toggle fill colors (White >> Yellow >> Sky blue >> Gray)
Ctrl + Shift + D: Default fill color
Ctrl + Shift + N: Toggle number formats
Ctrl + Shift + M: Default number format
Ctrl + Shift + Alt + . (period): Add indentation
Ctrl + Shift + Alt + , (comma): Remove indentation
Ctrl + Shift + . (period): Increase decimal places
Ctrl + Shift + , (comma): Decrease decimal places
Ctrl + Shift + X: Zoom in
Ctrl + Shift + Z: Zoom out
Ctrl + Shift + Alt + F: Initialize sheet
Ctrl + Shift + H: Toggle horizontal alignment
Ctrl + Shift + L: Toggle vertical alignment
Ctrl + Alt + 0~6: Set bottom border
Ctrl + Shift + W: Wrap content
Ctrl + Shift + O: Overflow content
Ctrl + Shift + P: Clip content

More functionalities are coming soon!

** Requirement **
As of version 0.4.2, Modeling+ Pro only works in an English setting environment. You must set your Google Sheets language to English to use all the functionalities.
